hero.subtitle: Connecting ambitious students with innovative companies through our intelligent allocation engine.

about.title: About the Scheme
about.description: The PM Internship Scheme is a national initiative designed to bridge the gap between academia and industry. Our AI-Based Smart Allocation Engine ensures a fair, transparent, and efficient process for matching talented students with meaningful internship opportunities across various sectors, fostering skill development and contributing to national growth.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Students create a profile, upload their resume, and specify their internship preferences.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Companies post internship opportunities with detailed skill requirements and role descriptions.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Our AI engine analyzes all data to create the best matches based on skills, preferences, and fairness metrics.

features.title: Our Features
features.f1Desc: Advanced algorithms for optimal student-internship pairing.
features.f2Desc: Ensures equitable opportunity distribution across demographics.
features.f3Desc: Instant updates on applications and opportunities.
features.f5Desc: Monitors and promotes diversity in all allocations.
features.f6Desc: Intuitive dashboards for students, companies, and admins.
